title: Inferno
desc:
- <:inferno:1118594776716021780> can be played either if their condition is met or if the color was switched right before your turn. (Card is <:blue:1106234079055200378>, someone plays <:black:1106265022453268530>, you may play <:inferno:1118594776716021780>)
- Any non <:colorless:1106434944261177374> or <:wild:1106237191388143838> card can be played on top of an <:inferno:1118594776716021780> card.
- When <:inferno:1118594776716021780> are flipped their color is now <:orange:1106716206905438231> + <:pink:1106716301843497030>.
- Must have an alternative playing condition.
